name: Temple Tilter
author: Asphyxiate
notes: Deck is pretty consistent and deals with CA easily. Managed to get some OTKs against ninjas when going second with temple and inaba/skystarray combo. 3 inabas instead of skystarray to prevent getting blocked by econ/sk which is pretty common in today's meta. One aegis to deal with the occassional weevil burn encountered on my climb.
